article_title: Obama's Budget Proves Old People Are Bankrupting The Country

article_metadata.description: The elderly continue to consume a larger and larger share of federal spending at a time when they are the only age group whose incomes are rising. If we do not reverse this trend, federal spending on the elderly will crush working Americans under either enormous debt, sky-high taxes, or both.
article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman

og.description: The elderly continue to consume a larger and larger share of federal spending at a time when they are the only age group whose incomes are rising.
